name: Troniverse
description:
You're attacked by enemies all around in the "Troniverse". Defend yourself till death with all your skills!

Destroy the enemies and asteroids to collect upgrade points and buy weapons and upgrades to support your skills.

The ship is controlled by the mouse. Fire laser with the left button. Enter the upgrade shop with space key.

For better ship control press to catch the mouse in the game window.

This is a very early game prototype, so please consider those problems and future improvements. I'll implement them based on time and feedback.

Improvement list:

  • Limited player lives
  • Upgrade system with point based costs (currently all upgrades are open)
  • More upgrades types (Live, Speed, radius for various area detectors, more weapons,...
  • More enemies
  • More game play balancing (upgrades vs. enemies vs. points)
  • Highscore system
  • In-Game help info
  • Alternative 2D line drawing library with better quality
